testcase.classname: Creating Potential Debit and Credit notes for the Qty and Rate mismatch records for IPOs
testcase.name: Creating a Credit Note
testcase.system-out: When user navigates to Login page...........................................passed Given Login with the Fabric Manager.........................................passed And Click on the SignIn button..............................................passed Then Navigate to the Potential Debit Note screen............................passed When Click on the Credit Note button under the Actions column...............passed Then Verify whether the page is navigated to the Credite Note form..........passed When Click on Submit button in the Credit note form.........................passed Then Verify whether the mandatory validation msg is displayed...............passed Given Enter Reason in the Credit Note form..................................passed When Click on Submit button in the Credit note form.........................passed Then Verify the Successfull msg.............................................passed
